title: NFL Championship Sunday, Tom Brady, and where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: NFL Championship Sunday, Tom Brady, and where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin talks about NFL Championship Sunday, the era of New England Patriots QB Tom Brady, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Michael Vick, Eric Dickerson, Trent Dilfer, and Josh Norman.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
